text: Bangalaia stiriaca is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the type species of its genus. It was described by Duvivier in 1890. It is known from Nigeria and the Democratic Republic of the Congo.BioLib.cz - Bangalaia stiriaca. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Prosopocerini Category:Beetles described in 1890
title: Bangalaia stiriaca
